text: Has anyone created Custom tab in the contact page and link it to the iframe? Please check the screenshot.
Hi! Are you trying to have the Tab click open a popup iframe modal? Can you tell me more about your use case?

<@U05KNCMAE7N> how can we use this to create demos and proposals? I only see one accordion component and I'm not familiar with Figma so no idea how to use. I'd like to see if this helpful for a mockup and provide feedback.

Does anyone have any ideas to create a table with a expand/collapse functionality? I dont think its possible with the table component but wondering if anyone has any workaround - I am thinking of using the panel component to show details about each row but that doesn't allow the final user to compare seamlessly.

Cristobal, if you go to left navigation, you will find all the components there. Granted that it's not easy for non-Figma users to build visualizations. Would you be open to learning it though?

I'm curious to understand what's your preferred method to create demos and proposals generally?
No, we don't want to open a popup
It will be a tab where I want to load my iframe
